bug.author: nbro
bug.summary: Documentation for placeholder does not explain when shape is (), [] or [None]
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>System information</denchmark-h>
Not necessary. <denchmark-h:h3>Describe the problem</denchmark-h>
The documentation for placeholder does not explain the case when its shape is (), [] or [None]. <denchmark-h:h3>Possible solution</denchmark-h>
Add the explanations in <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/a/46941087/3924118>this SO answer</denchmark-link> to the documentation of , including the example !!

comments.comment: IMO this is well documented in Tensor Ranks, Shapes and Types. Closing this.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/shivaniag>@shivaniag</denchmark-link> Can you please link me to a place where it is documented?
